about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description:
We are a company committed to providing solutions for the industrial sector of energy-conducting wires and cables, offering equipment and services that ensure efficiency and continuity of operations.

With decades of market experience, we manufacture high-performance equipment to meet customized demands for energy-conducting cable manufacturing. Our operations extend beyond national borders, with established contracts in countries like Chile, Argentina, and Spain, consolidating our international presence.

Our commitment goes beyond manufacturing. We provide technical support and specialized maintenance to ensure your equipment is always in perfect working order, minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity. We understand that each industry has unique challenges, which is why we develop tailored solutions to meet the specific needs of each client, whether in the domestic or international market.

our_departments.title: Our Departments
our_departments.engineering_description: Our engineering department is responsible for developing innovative solutions, designing equipment and systems that meet each client's specific needs, ensuring high efficiency and quality.
our_departments.machining_description:
Our Machining department is dedicated to manufacturing high-precision parts using CNC machining centers, CNC lathes, conventional machines, and cutting-edge equipment. We handle everything from small-scale demands to complex, customized projects, always focusing on quality, efficiency, and strict deadlines.

Our expertise guarantees solutions that meet the highest standards, from development to final production, with special attention to details and finishing.
our_departments.assembly_description:
We integrate mechanical and electronic components, delivering complete and customized systems.

Our qualified team performs assemblies of devices, machines, and highly complex equipment, always ensuring perfect interaction between components. We guarantee that every delivered solution operates efficiently, safely, and within the technical standards required by the market.

torcedeira_rigida.title: Rigid Strander
torcedeira_rigida.description:
This equipment can contain modules (cages) with 6 spools, 12 spools, 18 spools, and others upon request.

This machine was developed for twisting wires or cables made of copper and aluminum using standardized spools with a diameter of 630mm, arranged linearly along the main axis in parts called cages.

We offer a twisting line composed of three stages: a unit with six spools, a unit with twelve spools, and one with eighteen spools, among others upon request.
Suitable for both cable formation and shielding.

buncher_630_1800.title: Buncher's 630 - 1600
buncher_630_1800.description:
The Bunchers are double-twist machines for the manufacture of copper and aluminum conductor cables, with high performance and power ranging from 20KW to 180KW, with linear speeds of up to 300m/min and twist rates of 5000T/min, depending on the equipment.

We offer Buncher 630, Buncher 800, Buncher 1000, Buncher 1250, and Buncher 1600.

desenrolador_duplo.title: Double Pay-Off 630-800 and 1000-1250
desenrolador_duplo.description:
This motorized pay-off was developed to feed Bunchers and other equipment that require continuous, tension-controlled supply of bare or insulated wires.

Its maximum speed is 300m/min, using standardized spools with diameters ranging from 630mm to 800mm, and from 1000mm to 1250mm.

bobinador_desbobinador_portal.title: Portal Winder and Unwinder
bobinador_desbobinador_portal.description:
These portal-type machines were developed to accommodate a wide range of spools, where the structure moves automatically through a motorized mechanical transmission, both for closing and lifting, as well as spreading the cable in winder mode, being simultaneously controlled with the production line speed where it will be installed.

They are developed according to the specific needs of each client.

desenrolador_multiplo.title: Multiple Pay-Off
desenrolador_multiplo.description:
This motorized pay-off was made to feed Bunchers and other equipment requiring continuous, tension-controlled supply of bare or insulated wires.

This equipment accommodates multiple spools with diameters ranging from 600mm to 800mm, with a maximum linear speed of 300m/min.

planetaria_1000.title: Planetary 1000
planetaria_1000.description: This planetary cabling line was developed for the assembly of aluminum cables for spools with a diameter of 1000mm.

multifilar_8_fios.title: 8-Wire Multi-Draw (TM8)
multifilar_8_fios.description:
The multi-wire drawing line was developed for the production of copper wires for conductor cables, including flexible cables, automotive cables, battery cables, building installation cables, photovoltaic cables, data cables, special cables, and others.

The SUPICOM drawing line consists of the Drawing Unit, Annealer, and Winder, forming a compact line working in sync using advanced and up-to-date industrial technology.

desenrolador_vergalhao.title: Rod Pay-Off
desenrolador_vergalhao.description: Specialized pay-off for rods, designed to provide smooth and controlled unwinding of heavy materials such as metal rods.

enfitadeira.title: Taping Machine
enfitadeira.description: Machine designed to precisely and efficiently apply tapes to various types of cables and wires, ensuring proper protection and insulation.

aplicadores_de_linhas.title: SZ Line
aplicadores_de_linhas.description: Specialized equipment for twisting and precise application of lines in cable production processes, ensuring proper alignment and tension.

puxadores.title: Capstans
puxadores.description: Traction and control system for cable production lines, offering precision in speed and tension control during the manufacturing process.

bobinadores.title: Winders
bobinadores.description: Equipment designed to uniformly and controllably wind cables and wires onto spools, ensuring efficient storage and transportation.

desbobinadores.title: Unwinders
desbobinadores.description: Specialized machines for unwinding cables and wires from spools in a controlled manner, feeding production lines or installation processes.

mono_torcao.title: Single Twist
mono_torcao.description: This machine was developed to provide single-twist cabling or the assembly of multiple cables requiring twisting, ensuring the final cable diameter does not exceed 40mm. Ideal for the production of Flexible Cables and assembly of special cables. For more information, contact us.

others.title: Other Equipment
others.description:
Supicom develops specific equipment, such as:

- Roll Fractionators
- Re-spooling Lines
- Linear Tape Applicators with one or two heads
- Annealers
- Caterpillars

news.title: Highlights
news.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest news

service.subtitle: Customized Industrial Solutions for Your Business
service.manufacturing_description: We supply specialized machines and equipment for the production of copper and aluminum wires and cables and their alloys, including flexible, communication, control, battery, photovoltaic, data, special cables, and others.
service.rent_description: We offer rental services for commercial and industrial machines and equipment without an operator, suitable for various needs.
service.maintenance_description: We provide industrial machinery maintenance and repair services, ensuring maximum efficiency and longevity of the equipment.
service.development_description: We develop customized industrial projects, from planning to execution, guaranteeing innovative and efficient solutions for your business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Didn't find what you were looking for? Check out some answers to the most common questions.
